snippet: General Motors Co dismissed several high-ranking executives, including at least one vice president and two directors, for their roles in the still-unfolding drama over deadly ignition switches in older GM cars, people familiar with the matter told...

headline.print_headline: GM Dismissed Vice President, Two Directors in Recall Probe: Sources
headline.main: GM Dismissed Vice President, Two Directors in Recall Probe: Sources

lead_paragraph: General Motors Co dismissed several high-ranking executives, including at least one vice president and two directors, for their roles in the still-unfolding drama over deadly ignition switches in older GM cars, people familiar with the matter told Reuters.
